test_coverage.note: First ticket completed. Test coverage is comprehensive with 16 Test Agent verification tests plus 5 pytest unit tests covering all 8 acceptance criteria.

important: Pipeline baseline established: This is the first ticket (CMH-001) and first test run (TR-001), establishing baseline metrics for future comparison.
Perfect test pass rate: 21/21 tests passing. 16 new Test Agent verification tests created, 5 existing pytest unit tests maintained.
Comprehensive acceptance criteria coverage: All 8 acceptance criteria have corresponding test cases. No gaps detected.
Clean build: 13 files created/modified across 2 commits. All self-checks passed (compiles, meets criteria, no mocks, no placeholders).
Clean validation: 6/6 validation checks passed. Zero critical, major, or minor issues. Zero mock/placeholder patterns detected.
PR ready to merge: PR #28 is OPEN and MERGEABLE. No conflicts, no blocking issues.
minor: Outdated dependencies detected: pip (24.3.1 -> 26.0.1), py-key-value-aio (0.3.0 -> 0.4.0), referencing (0.36.2 -> 0.37.0). None are critical dependencies for this project. No known vulnerabilities.

Package name discrepancy noted: Validate Agent suggestion - GitHub issue #1 references 'claude_memory_helper' but Build Agent correctly used 'claude_code_helper_mcp' matching the repo name. This is correct convention and does not require action.

summary: CMH-001 monitoring: ALL HEALTHY. First ticket completed successfully with perfect test coverage (21/21 passing, 100% acceptance criteria coverage). Build clean, validation passed, PR mergeable. Zero test gaps, zero patterns, zero regressions. Baseline metrics established for Phase 1. Minor outdated dependencies noted (non-critical). Ready to proceed to CMH-002.
